article_title: Obamacare Premium Hikes Much Higher Than We've Been Told

article_metadata.description: The Obama administration is now predicting a leveling off of enrollment. (SAUL LOEB/AFP/Getty Images) The Obama administration claims that the premium increases in the (Obamacare) health insurance exchanges are averaging 7.5% across the country. That figure, however, turns out to be wrong. An analysis by the Daily Caller News Foundation says [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
